name: Admission type
description: User-defined table indicating the circumstances under which the patient was or will be admitted

values.definition: Patient admission due to accidental injury
Planned admission for non-urgent medical care
Unplanned admission requiring immediate medical attention
Admission for childbirth and obstetric care
Standard planned admission for routine care

notes: User-defined table allows customization for organization-specific admission workflows and policies.

vendorVariations.epic: Supports standard codes with additional internal categories for specialized units
vendorVariations.cerner: Uses standard values with organization-defined extensions for service lines
vendorVariations.allscripts: Standard implementation with optional workflow-specific subcategories
